features: EVERYDAY EXFOLIATING FACE WASH: A daily face wash that uses activated charcoal to dissolve dirt, exfoliate, and fight breakouts and acne. Antioxidant-rich Alpine Caribou Moss from northern Finland boosts elasticity and guards against environmental stressors like pollution.

UNIQUE SOLID STICK FORMULA: An easy to use, non-messy face wash. Simply apply stick to face (avoiding eyes) and with wet fingers gently massage all around face to activate. Rinse and pat dry. May be used on your beard and before shaving for a closer shave.

POWERFUL, PORTABLE AND SPILL-FREE: Our Solid Face Wash comes in solid stick form, meaning it won't spill in your bag. Since it isn't a liquid, it's TSA-friendly and perfect for on-the-go travel or in your gym bag.
FEEL GOOD ABOUT WHAT YOU'RE PUTTING ON YOUR SKIN: Our face wash is made with clean ingredients. Dermatologist tested and free of glycol, parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and animal cruelty.
GREAT FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Our face wash manages excess oil and buildup without drying out your skin and helps keep breakouts in check.
body.description: Product Description This isn't your average face wash. Activated Charcoal gently draws out impurities and dissolves deep-down dirt, helping keep breakouts at bay. Meanwhile, antioxidant-rich Alpine Caribou Moss boosts elasticity and guards against environmental stressors like pollution.The solid stick form is spill-free, travel-friendly and fun to use. Simply apply to your face and massage with wet fingers. Suited for all skin types, this trusty stick is the skincare equivalent of seizing the day. Free from Parabens, Phthalates, Sulfates and Gluten. Vegan and Animal Cruelty-free. Brand Story We create natural, powerful skin care products without any toxins. We've engineered and tested products that work as hard as you do. The result? Powerful, natural, non-toxic, TSA-approved skin care at a price point that suits.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Solid Face Wash Face + Eye Cream Wake Up Eye Stick Wake Up Face Serum Everyday Anti-Aging Face Moisturizer with SPF 37 Anti-Everything Pads Benefits Activated Charcoal and other exfoliants draw out impurities and dissolve deep-down dirt. The solid stick form is spill-free, travel-friendly and fun to use. Simply apply to your face and massage with wet fingers. It's light, absorbs quickly, and won't leave your skin greasy. Our balanced formula is unscented, great for all skin types and made to use on both your face and under-eye area. Our Wake Up Eye Stick with caffeine helps cool and depuff your undereyes any time of day. Looking awake has never been so easy. The 3 key ingredients work together to address a range of skin issues, including helping to reduce redness, hyperpigmentation, dark spots, fine lines/wrinkles, and dry skin Light, oil-free, non-greasy and reef friendly. SPF 37 protects you from the sun and defends your skin against signs of aging Exfoliates to remove dead skin cells and reduces the buildup that can cause breakouts, blackheads, and ingrown haris, and helps minimize the appearance of pores Key Ingredients Activated Charcoal, Alpine Caribou Moss, and Coconut Extract Aloe Vera, Shea Butter, Alpine Caribou Moss, Vitamin E, Safflower Oil Aloe Vera, Alpine Caribou Moss, Caffeine Encapsulated Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Vitamin E Hyaluronic Acid, Alpine Caribou Moss, Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 Glycolic Acid and Salicylic Acid Application Apply stick to face, wet fingers and gentrly massage around face to activate. Rinse and pat dry. Apply evenly on clean skin morning and night. Apply a thin layer under your eyes and thicker amount on the rest of your face. May be used after shaving Gently roll across under-eye area twice per use. Apply a thin layer of serum to clean, dry skin on the neck and face area Simply apply to your face and neck as you would a typical face moisturizer Gently wipe over clean face and neck. Skin Types All All All All All All Free From Free of alcohol, parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and talc. Vegan and cruelty free Free of alcohol, parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and talc. Vegan and cruelty free Free of alcohol, parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and talc. Vegan and cruelty free Free of alcohol, parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and talc. Vegan and cruelty free

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lasts a Long Time - Don't get it wet
reviews.reviewText: Lasts a long time. Great for sensitive skin. Do not get the actual product wet. Apply to dry skin, then wet face and scrub in. Make sure to retract BEFORE putting cap back on. Wasted quite a bit getting stuck under the cap and on threads

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST face wash for acne!!!
reviews.reviewText: I can’t say enough good things about this product. Over the past year, my acne has been horrible and I’ve tried every natural/organic face wash I could find. Some made me break out worse, some didn’t work, and others made my skin inflamed. This product is so gentle and exfoliates just a little bit—the perfect amount. Scent is gender neutral and light/not too strong. Leaves my completion clean and not oily or dry. It’s helped SO MUCH with scaring from past acne too—it started reducing the red scars within two washes. Worth the $20. Takes off makeup easily. I apply it directly to my dry face, wet my hands and scrub my face a little with my hands, cup water with my hands and rinse my face off, then use a clean cloth to dry my face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good face wash
reviews.reviewText: I like the scent and the cleaning power just make sure you have a moisturizer because it tends to dry the skin out a bit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for traveling and lasts forever!
reviews.reviewText: How do we really know how well any soap or cleanser works as far as doing what it's intended to do -- how well it cleans and how good it really is for our face. It's difficult to assess. What I/we can say is that this product did not come with any negatives; had no negative effect on me.First, it seemed to last forever. You will definitely get a lot of use out of one unit.My face never felt dry after use, only clean and revitalized.Not the easiest to use, though, as you have to make sure it stays out of your eyes (as with almost every product anyway), but I never had any issue or any irritation whatsoever. Applying the product and using the right amount of water to spread will take some getting used to.What I really love about this product, among other things, is how easy and convenient it is to have while traveling! No soap container to worry about; lasts a long time; compact and lightweight; not at all messy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic dupe for Tarte's rainforest charcoal scrub stick.EXCEPT: this smells SO GOOD. And you get a great quantity of product. Men and women can definitely use this. I would describe this as a scrub, but not necessarily a medicated product.I recommend using in the shower and applying a gentle moisturizer/toner afterwards. I noticed it increased the effectiveness of my topical skin medicine because it did a good job of washing away the dead skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel, leaves face feeling and looking clean and fresh
reviews.reviewText: A friend recommended this to me and very glad they did. Easy to use and leaves your face feeling fresh and clean.It’s real benefit, though, is in travel. No need to worry about messes from spills (as had happened to me with liquid or gel-like face washes), and easy to fit in a dop kit.Product also lasts a long time, probably about three weeks to a month with regular use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love how much I get for my money! You just swipe some on and rub it in. There isn’t really a scent which I like. This product clears up my skin and makes it feel super clean!I love their products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Good for after shaving, works like it should
